item.title: About us
item.description: Board members Contact information info@t-rax.se Sven Hultins gata 8 412 58 Göteborg

item.title: Become a member
item.description: First step Send in an application of membership. >>Click this link and follow the steps in the application form<< Second step Pay for membership during open hours. Opening hours can be found in the footer of this page. Third step Attend a safety walk-through. Safety walk-throughs are held by T-RAX board members. Information about upcoming safety walk-throughs can be found on our social media. Congratulations you are now a member!

item.title: Workhops and labs
item.description: Overview In FUSE lab there are several different Makerspaces to use. Here is an overview of all the spaces available to members. Rapid prototyping Lab for rapid prototyping descriptive text Go to makerspace Textile workshop Textile workshop descriptive text Go to makerspace Metal workshop Metal workshop descriptive text Go to makerspace Wood workshop Wood workshop descriptive text Go to makerspace Electronics lab Electronics lab descriptive text Go to makerspace VR studio VR studio descriptive text
